review: I have heard the hype. I have seen others use it. I told myself I didnt need one. I dont know what i was thinking. This thing freaking rocks.My only complaint is a lack of spotify support (yeah yeah I know, tabcast, well the audio sucks thats why!) but I suspect the fault there lies with the likes of the RIAA stomping on everyone's fun.
